amendment.description: To provide for the modernization of the Department of Defense's mail delivery system to ensure the effective and efficient delivery of absentee ballots.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3278 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3278 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S7336-7340) To provide for the modernization of the Department of Defense's mail delivery system to ensure the effective and efficient delivery of absentee ballots.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3278 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Blunt.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3278 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
